message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $15,000.  I believe it holds significant value that justifies this price. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, thanks for your interest.  While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,000.  I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to meet you at $10,500. Can you consider that?
